column2: [Only available for use during cosmic exploration.]

Goodness me, it seems you've completed all the <Sheet(ClassJob,IntegerParameter(1),0)/> research we had prepared for!
Ahem... For the moment, please stand by!
Ahem! <Clickable(<Sheet(ClassJob,IntegerParameter(1),0)/>)/> research has proceeded sufficiently, so you may report to headquarters for debriefing.
Ahem. Your current progress in cosmic <Sheet(ClassJob,IntegerParameter(1),0)/> research is as follows.
If this goes like this...then that must go like...<Emphasis>that</Emphasis>...
Our research modules are based on those of the Studium, you know.
The further your cosmic research progresses, the better tools you might create! Exciting, no?
High-level research requires data of profound intricacy. Either you're capable of the task or, well. Ahem.
By expanding your research into other specialities, you can increase your overall efficiency!
